text: Hello, thank you very much for thorough response. We will contact manufacturers and try to organize at least remote sessions as you suggested. If you have personal experience later, after the installation of your system, I will be super happy to hear from you again. Thank you very much!

text: <@U04M5SGCM5J> I ve forgot to ask you: I ve heard that there should be also a Miltenyi Blaze light-sheet in Oxford: do you know by chance who is belonging to? Or who I should contact to get more info? Thanks
